metadata.documentation: Interannual variability in atmospheric carbon monoxide (CO) between 2001 and 2016 is determined from total column CO observations from the satellite instrument MOPITT. Climatological seasonal cycles in CO are subtracted from monthly averages in seven regions of the Southern Hemisphere and tropics, to produce records of CO anomalies.
